  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2119</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2119</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">¡Hola!</string>
            <string language="en">Hello!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hallo!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bonjour !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hello!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciao!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γειάσου!</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica interactiva (MUD) adreçada al cicle inicial de primària que treballa la utilització de fórmules socials en diferents contextos: salutació, acomiadament, agraïments, permís...  Conté activitats de pràctica (Practica) i d'avaluació (Avalua't) que mostren diferents situacions comunicatives. En cada cas cal trobar la fórmula social adient.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) for 6- to 8-year-olds on the use of social expressions in different contexts: greetings, saying goodbye, thanking, asking for permission, etc. It includes practice activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material interactiu</string>
            <string language="en">interactive material</string>
            <string language="es">material interactivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lexicologia</string>
            <string language="en">lexicology</string>
            <string language="es">lexicología</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) für 
6 zu 8-year-olds auf dem Gebrauch von Sozialausdrücken in den 
unterschiedlichen Kontexten: Grüße, sagen Auf Wiedersehen, 
dankend und bitten um Erlaubnis, usw.. Er schließt 
Praxisaktivitäten ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) pour 6 à 
8-year-olds sur l'utilisation des expressions sociales dans 
différents contextes : salutations, dire au revoir, remerciant,
demandant la permission, etc... Elle inclut des activités de 
pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) para 6- a 
8-year-olds no uso de expressões sociais em contextos diferentes: 
cumprimentos, dig adeus, agradecendo, pedindo permissão, etc.. 
Inclui atividades da prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) per 6 a 
8-year-olds sull'uso delle espressioni sociali nei contesti 
differenti: saluti, ad esempio arrivederci, ringraziando, 
chiedendo il permesso, ecc. Include le attività di pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) για 6 στο 
8-έτος στη χρήση των κοινωνικών εκφράσεων στα διαφορετικά 
πλαίσια: χαιρετισμοί, λέγοντας αντίο, ευχαριστία, που ρωτά
για τη δικαιοδοσία, κ.λπ.... Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες 
πρακτικής.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktives Material</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lexicology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matériel interactif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lexicology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">material interativo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lexicology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">materiale interattivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lexicology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογικό υλικό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">lexicology</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
